about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hi! I'm Sekh Ashik Billa, a passionate Full Stack Developer and Cloud & DevOps Engineer based in Kolkata, West Bengal. I have a strong foundation in web development principles and practices, with a focus on building high-quality, scalable applications. My journey in technology began during my vocational education in Computer Science, where I developed a keen interest in programming and software development.
about.internship: I recently completed an internship at Webguru Infosystem Pvt. Ltd., where I gained hands-on experience in developing web applications using modern technologies. This opportunity allowed me to work on exciting projects, collaborate with a talented team, and enhance my problem-solving skills.
about.learning: I'm always eager to learn new technologies and stay updated with industry trends. In addition to my technical skills, I believe in the importance of effective communication and teamwork in achieving successful outcomes.
about.vocational: Vocational Education in Computer Science - Basirhat Naihati N.C.M Shiksha Niketan
